feed.title: Tauticord Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.3.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [FIX] Live activity monitoring not running if voice channel settings disabled, regardless of text channel settings

Related PRs

  • [fix] Override voice channel check when determining if live activity cron should start by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/211

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.3.3...5.3.4

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.3.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [FIX] Emojis past 9 will now display/react correctly
  • Max reaction count has been reduced from 36 to 20
  • After 0-9, bot will use colored squares and circles as markers (prior use of the alphabet was invalid)

Related PRs

  • [chore] Improve Tauticord banner and icon for Unraid template by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/212
  • docs(README): update sponsors by @github-actions in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/213
  • [fix] Emojis (reactions) not being displaying by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/215

New Contributors

  • @github-actions made their first contribution in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/213

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.3.4...5.3.5

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Users can not toggle setting for termination reactions independently of Plex Pass availability (closes #216)
  • If you don't have a Plex Pass, this setting will be ignored

Related PRs

  • [feat] Add option to disable termination reaction options by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/217

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.3.5...5.4.0

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [ADDED] Improvements to debugging configuration
  • Bot will debug log the parsed config file as well as its resultant in-memory settings on boot
  • [CHANGED] Bot won't endlessly restart if config validation error occurs

Related PRs

  • [chore] Improve config parsing by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/218

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.4.0...5.4.1

entry.title: New release for Tauticord: v5.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [BREAKING] Add Tautulli v2.14 support, drop Tautulli v2.12 and v2.13 support
  • Breaking bump to underlying tautulli API library
  • If you need to maintain v2.12 or v2.13 compatibility, please pin your Docker container to a pre-5.5.0 version: https://hub.docker.com/r/nwithan8/tauticord/tags

Related PRs

  • [chore] Add Tautulli v2.14 compatibility, drop v2.12 and v2.13 support by @nwithan8 in https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/pull/220

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nwithan8/tauticord/compare/5.4.1...5.5.0
